sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AppService} from "./app.service"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'client'; constructor(private appService: AppService, private router: Router) { if (!this.appService.authenticated) { router.navigateByUrl('/login'); } } isAuthenticated() { return this.appService.authenticated; } }
